named-query.name: Entry.byGuids
named-query.query: select e from FeedEntry e where e.guid in :guids

named-query.name: Entry.unreadByFeed
named-query.query: select e from FeedEntry e where e.feed=:feed and not exists (select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.entry = e and s.user =:user and s.read=true)

named-query.name: Entry.readByFeed
named-query.query: select e from FeedEntry e where e.feed=:feed and exists (select s from FeedEntryStatus s where s.entry = e and s.user =:user and s.read=true)
